title: NCLT approves Aditya Birla group plan to merge NBFCs: Sources
description: Aditya Birla Group plans to consolidate its non-banking finance companies (NBFCs) to create better synergies and ensure optimal utilisation of resources and greater economies of scale, following approval by the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT).
